public static Configuration getConf(java.lang.String dir,
                                    java.lang.String ugi,
                                    java.lang.String conf)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Get Configuration.

参数：
dir - directory path in hdfs
ugi - hadoop ugi
conf - hadoop-site.xml path
返回：
Configuration
抛出：
java.io.IOException

deleteFiles

public static void deleteFiles(Path path,
                               boolean flag,
                               boolean isGlob)
Delete file specified by path or files in directory specified by path.

参数：
path - Path in hadoop
flag - need to do delete recursively
isGlob - need to use file pattern to match all files.

deleteFiles

public static void deleteFiles(FileSystem dfs,
                               Path path,
                               boolean flag,
                               boolean isGlob)
Delete file specified by path or files in directory specified by path.

参数：
dfs - handle of FileSystem
path - Path in hadoop
flag - need to do delete recursively
isGlob - need to use file pattern to match all files.

listDir

public static java.util.List<Path> listDir(Path srcpath,
                                           boolean isGlob)
List the statuses of the files/directories in the given path if the path is a directory.

参数：
srcpath - Path in FileSystem
isGlob - need to use file pattern
返回：
all Path in srcpath.
